docs.snippet: The company is making small changes to sort email search results better, changes that it hopes to extend to its other services....

docs.abstract: Yahoo is transforming its email search algorithms to allow users to have a greater ability to search more productively and faster through stored emails.

docs.snippet: Mr. Stewart attracted a generation of viewers ready to embrace an outlier whose exaggerations, in their view, carried more truth than conventional newscasts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Stewart attracted a generation of viewers ready to embrace an outlier whose exaggerations, in their view, carried more truth than conventional newscasts.
docs.abstract: Profile of Jon Stewart, who is leaving preparing to step down as host of The Daily Show on Comedy Central after 16-year tenure; Stewart has become one of nation's most bracing and sarcastic critics of politics and media; polls indicate that he was equally trusted and distrusted, and that his viewer numbers had fallen in recent years.

headline.main: Jon Stewart, Sarcastic Critic of Politics and Media, Is Signing Off
headline.print_headline: A Sarcastic Critic of Politics and Media, Signing Off
